name: damnably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very annoying: The game is damnably difficult to understand. It was so damnably hot and I felt sleepy. See
damnable
More examplesFewer examplesHe was so damnably tired, yet could feel his heart hammering in his chest You have put me in a most damnably awkward position.The songs stuck in my head damnably, to the extent that the catchy title tune is still with me.
